```{r}
overview <- targets::tar_read_raw(glue::glue("overview_{cohort}"))

admissions_perc <- overview |>
  dplyr::filter(activity_type == "Admissions") |>
  dplyr::pull(perc)

beddays_perc <- overview |>
  dplyr::filter(activity_type == "Beddays") |>
  dplyr::pull(perc)

if (check_if_efficiency_mitigator(cohort, mitigator_summary_table)) {
  overview <- overview |>
    dplyr::filter(activity_type == "Beddays")
  
  statement <- glue::glue("{beddays_perc}% of {treatment_type_title} beddays")
} else_if (check_if_zero_los_mitigator(mitigator)) {
  overview <- overview |>
    dplyr::filter(activity_type == "Admissions")
  statement <- glue::glue("{admissions_perc}% of {treatment_type_title} admissions")
}  else {
  statement <- glue::glue(
    "{admissions_perc}% of {treatment_type_title} admissions and {beddays_perc}% of {treatment_type_title} beddays"
  )
}

```

In 2023/24, `r statement` fall under mitigable activity for the `r cohort_title` cohort.
